item.title: By: Chip Bennett
item.dc:creator: Chip Bennett
item.description: I'm pretty sure that every single one of us on the Theme Review Team would echo Konstantin's sentiment. I have become a considerably better Theme developer as a direct result of my involvement with Theme Review. Beforehand, I didn't even know what I yet needed to learn - and I continue to learn more new things every day, and with every Theme I review.
item.content:encoded: I’m pretty sure that every single one of us on the Theme Review Team would echo Konstantin’s sentiment. I have become a considerably better Theme developer as a direct result of my involvement with Theme Review. Beforehand, I didn’t even know what I yet needed to learn – and I continue to learn more new things every day, and with every Theme I review.
